title: Hired: The Smarter, Faster, Easier Way to Get a Job as a UX Desi
description:
Description
o you love your job? Are you paid what you’re worth? If you’re a designer and answered ‘no’ to either of those questions¦ its time for a change. Life is too short! Hired: The Smarter, Faster, Easier Way to Get a Job as a UX Designer is a step by step guide to help you find a job as a designer. Learn how to find your dream job in UX¦even if you didn’t go to design school, can’t code, or don’t have professional experience yet.
In the book you’ll learn how to…
Create an irresistible resume and portfolio that brings opportunities to you.
Learn creative ways to find a jobwithout filling out a hundred applications.
Prepare for your job search and design interviews like a seasoned professional.
The book is a result of 10+ years of being a tech professional and hundreds of one-on-one coaching sessions with designers.
Who is this for?
From complete beginners to seasoned professionals, there’s something for all levels of design professionals in the book. Whatever type of designer you are, including…
User Experience (UX) Designers
User Interface (UI) Designers
Visual Designers
Web Designers
Interaction Designers
Product Designers
UX Architects
User Researchers
“After coaching designers one-on-one independently and then with a leading design bootcamp, I wrote this to help more people find a great job. Life’s too short to hate where your work!” – Jon Izquierdo
